title: How bad is the NO2 gas pollution in the EU?
subtitle: The average NO2 pollution in the EU is as high as 14.95 µg/cubic meter and decreased from 2023 to 2024 by 1.7%. This figure is still above the WHO recommendations of 10 µg/cubic meter.
textNote: The average value has been calculated based on the available annual mean data provided by a country specific varying number of air measuring stations.
